text: Klara Amalie Skoglund (22 September 1891 - 8 May 1978) was a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. She was born in Oslo. She was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Østfold in 1945, and was re-elected on two occasions. She had previously served in the position of deputy representative during the term 1937-1945\. ==References== * Category:1891 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:Women members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian women politicians Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Klara Amalie Skoglund
